mdRecord.dcterms:title: President John F. and Jacqueline Kennedy hosted a state dinner at Mount Vernon, July 11, 1961
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rowe, Abbie, 1905-1967
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photograph of President John F. and Jacqueline Kennedy hosting a state dinner at Mount Vernon in honor of President Mohammad Ayub Khan of Pakistan and his daughter, Naseem Akhtar Aurangzeb. The photographer's name and date of the event are stamped on the reverse as well as '6687-P' written in red ink.
